lyrics.stanza: Deep in God's heart there's been, Before the time began, God's desire to be expressed, This He planned in eternal past.
God eternal had a purpose In eternal past. He created man in His image that man would God express.
Man from the dust of the ground At the end, New Jerusalem. Here God's wisdom and love abound. Oh! This is most profound!
Deep in God's heart He planned To mingle Himself with man. God, as a river and a tree, Man's food and drink to be.
God our enjoyment Issues the fulfillment: A city as His expression Built with gold, pearl and precious stones.
